allow:
Bash(# Copy webfonts (solid, regular, light, and brands)
cp fontawesome-pro-6.7.2-web/webfonts/fa-solid-900.woff2 src/web/public/fonts/
cp fontawesome-pro-6.7.2-web/webfonts/fa-regular-400.woff2 src/web/public/fonts/
cp fontawesome-pro-6.7.2-web/webfonts/fa-light-300.woff2 src/web/public/fonts/
cp fontawesome-pro-6.7.2-web/webfonts/fa-brands-400.woff2 src/web/public/fonts/

# Copy CSS files
cp fontawesome-pro-6.7.2-web/css/fontawesome.min.css src/web/public/css/
cp fontawesome-pro-6.7.2-web/css/solid.min.css src/web/public/css/
cp fontawesome-pro-6.7.2-web/css/regular.min.css src/web/public/css/
cp fontawesome-pro-6.7.2-web/css/light.min.css src/web/public/css/
cp fontawesome-pro-6.7.2-web/css/brands.min.css src/web/public/css/)
